entries.name: new(uri)
entries.desc: Creates a new URI formatter for uri.

entries.name: escape()
entries.desc: Escapes the uri for use as a CGI parameter

entries.name: normalize()
entries.desc: Normalize the URI by adding “http://” if it is missing.

entries.name: unescape()
entries.desc: Unescapes the uri which came from a CGI parameter
